58dec31268f82638.voiceContent: That's not it. It's not a matter of Mora...

61c1db1a6aa5ecbe.voiceContent: You don't mean... I mistakenly believed...

1585bdca7fbb187d.voiceContent: Naturally. I can assure you of that.

cc1608ffdedd3a2d.voiceContent: *sigh* I'm sorry... I made a fool of myself.

89f2a609a46059f3.voiceContent: Everything went better than I thought. I'm a little too happy... I'll be fine in a moment...

8268385459000745.voiceContent: Who would've thought that this book was all about some dastardly, immoral villain!

cac43977c7969dfe.voiceContent: Hmm. If you ask me, it would be a nice place to settle down in.

955b85e553b30715.voiceContent: After much deliberation, I finally thought of a solution in two-flavor hot pot.

f7af7f994dd02f2f.voiceContent: Phew... This is the last round for today...

2c0758f9589bdc55.voiceContent: If you're looking to train today, or hunt evil spirits, I'll definitely accompany you.

0725c95648daabea.voiceContent: Anyway, thank you for inviting me to such a cozy place...

3518675d3bcdeb6d.voiceContent: If you need anything from me, I'll help out.

728c1da18e4cdb46.voiceContent: You head to bed first. Don't worry, I'll rest after another round of practice.

bb809fc25155537a.voiceContent: If I do, I have to carry a parasol around and keep an eye on the sun.

d8f2aa6d0e259ed6.voiceContent: It was really hard to control my anger.

24ff477ff629d6a1.voiceContent: This realm isn't as cool as the snowy mountains, but I don't need to worry about being scorched by the sun or sudden temperature changes.

54c30d31e13e3ab3.voiceContent: Iâ€”In other words, we can go soon...?

d5fc8c45227ea56b.voiceContent: Alright. I actually just had an infuriating experience.

bbfce92299392661.voiceContent: You mean... this person isn't real?

7a96ed8700fce920.voiceContent: I can concentrate on training since there's no need to worry about the effects of my yang energy.

e58919d61a4d367b.voiceContent: This way, I can enjoy a light soup base even if you have Jueyun Chili soup as yours.

d706cc0f15a19e48.voiceContent: Uhh... I'd like to invite you to... eat two-flavor hot pot with me.

6395a7de5d7f6032.voiceContent: Also, hot pot ingredients are usually thinly sliced, so I can quickly cool them down in a bowl of ice water before eating.

4936d875da71e439.voiceContent: What made me angry was... How could there be such an atrocious person on this earth!?

10024bed94026784.voiceContent: A partition is placed onto a steaming Liyue-style pot to divide the soup into two sides.

0e2d8f29a1275ce0.voiceContent: But the plot's twists and turns felt like they were unfolding right before my eyes!

964e99f6fe06068f.voiceContent: You know, because of my constitution, I can't eat food until it has completely cooled down.

149137ff4165dba6.voiceContent: I've always thought it was a pity... that I was unable to eat at the same time as you...

291ffe5dd4bf60f4.voiceContent: It went like this. Not too long ago, I heard someone talking about a book called Anecdotes of Demons and Oddities. I spent a lot to buy a copy.

c8d98a8fc8818aea.voiceContent: If I ran into them, I'd definitely...

86c20c66063775bf.voiceContent: It took half a day to get my breathing and blood pressure under control.

a8ea3ac1cb56899c.voiceContent: Strange anecdotes, rumors of evil spirits... If you come across such news, please remember to share them with me.

aa131f019bccb2c4.voiceContent: Do you have any plans today?

1b8d50fa5440fe3f.voiceContent: The label...? No, I wasn't bothered by the book's title.

9bc9cdd48ab1b20c.voiceContent: Simple tents... and a traveler's pack... Practicing here would be great.

5e427bbc75cd3123.voiceContent: How did you know that I was worrying about finding a place to practice?

0aade7cbac4e26dd.voiceContent: Good thinking, setting this up around your house. Many thanks for the trouble you went to.

fe64f088a2a77e74.voiceContent: Weapons can go there, and Sigils can go under my pillow. Mm-hmm.

ab417e6ff066c2eb.voiceContent: After returning from a long journey, it would feel nice to rest here before heading out again.

57ad2a7f26e824c5.voiceContent: But where should I put my parasol... I suppose I'll just put it by the door.

2600852937704415.voiceContent: Have you procured all the ingredients for the popsicles?

6bf5f787142d27fa.voiceContent: Have you procured all the ingredients for the popsicles?

637ce06d52a88d89.voiceContent: Just don't try to be a hero. I am responsible for protecting you, after all.

b5ae46745a980ac8.voiceContent: If you come across a powerful demon, I'll get there as fast as possible.

dc38e3c1d6a649b0.voiceContent: You're right. I just need to stay disciplined.

5ccc51a7e8c46917.voiceContent: *sigh* ...You're right. It's a shame to say that I've grown accustomed to such things. You shouldn't have to comfort me.

67a4c75f1739c64f.voiceContent: That's right. The only way you could settle a question like this would be with those special goggles they have in light novels, where you can read someone's power level just by looking at them.

562b937026e5e0c9.voiceContent: If we're talking the strongest... I'd have to pick Wind Reader. After all, he was the founding master of Qimen Divination.

0c4a0790b4e94ee9.voiceContent: Alright, sorry to trouble you again.

f2b324d006f4eef2.voiceContent: So... I went to take a look, and inside His Lordship's room, there was definitely a strange chill in the air. But I'm confident it's not caused by evil spirits.

c4ee731a9b0e2b7d.voiceContent: I'll come with you. I wanna take another look at His Lordship's room.

66234900bf157908.voiceContent: It's... fetor of death. A sign that death is near.

13f2e2f9b727afc9.voiceContent: Well... this is just a theory, but I think that...

560a59237971b6ac.voiceContent: Paimon's a lot smarter than I remember... I guess it's been a long time since we last met.

95b5bd0e4aac7584.voiceContent: Hmm, objects like this may prove useful when purging evil spirits.

1358fb269ac31dc4.voiceContent: My name is Chongyun. My family has practiced the art of exorcism in Liyue for many generations. Fate has been generous in allowing my path to cross with that of your distinguished self. ...Oh, no â€” my services are free of charge!

9bd988a066b73756.voiceContent: Exorcism uses thaumaturgy and martial arts to conquer evil. There are other means to the same end, but they are not the true way.

0c1db6a933037cb9.voiceContent: I take my meals cold to quiet the spirit and calm my vital energies. Qingxin-infused water with ice is the most effective.

86fa5cb173803638.voiceContent: Heart be pure, evil be erased. Mind be purged, world be... Um... Ugh, I always forget that last part.

aa9d9f75465aa2bc.voiceContent: There is no purer form of water than rain. It can aid us greatly in the purging of evil.

7edc562b61d7fcdf.voiceContent: Before the resounding thunder, evil must cower in fear.

69123be12f57578e.voiceContent: It is unwise to waste the precious morning hours. Time to train!

edfcfd2e16d5f6aa.voiceContent: One's spiritual energies are at their peak at noon. We must take that time to practice.

92515f77ba3e0914.voiceContent: As the day winds down and the quiet of evening sets in, the atmosphere is ripe for focusing your mind. There is no better time than this for training.

7bc4790e0e42af1c.voiceContent: Whew. What a tiring day. You should get some rest. Don't forget what we agreed â€” we will investigate that haunted house tomorrow.

10fad090899bd653.voiceContent: We exorcists have been protectors of Liyue since ancient times, and our techniques have been passed down from generation to generation. Purging evil is second nature to us.

58949cd67acfc3fc.voiceContent: By now, you must be well acquainted with Liyue's supernatural phenomena. Now, about the evil beings you speak of in lands beyond... I would very much like to see them too.

010b7b365fe23eed.voiceContent: *sigh* I didn't actually do anything. I just walked into that haunted house, and the problem was resolved... Do you think I should still take payment for this exorcism?

9e1f70252611f2f1.voiceContent: Your skills are impressive. When you finish with a hilichurlâ€” I mean, an evil spirit, it is surely banished from this world for good. How about we team up?

af51a515bfa7382b.voiceContent: Visions are powerful, but one would be foolish to place blind faith in them. Personally, I trust more in thaumaturgy and martial arts. In the end, one cannot become truly proficient without vigorous training.

b029778a97e500c8.voiceContent: There are rumors abound concerning evil spirits in Liyue, but not all have truth to them. In fact, some strange commissions wind up having nothing to do with them at all.

1e3c48edcb0606ca.voiceContent: I have heard there are many strange and rare things sealed within the amber from Mt. Hulao. Could some of them be the fabled demons of which the ancient legends speak? I would love to investigate.

2e6b9eb0507acbec.voiceContent: That Zhongli from the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor seems to be quite an incredible man. Just think, common folk might gang up to commit a murder, we exorcists vanquish demons â€” but he alone buries the bodies of the adepti.

28353241cf9368e6.voiceContent: I do admire Xingqiu for his devotion to chivalry and his martial arts proficiency. However â€” I must warn you that he definitely has a mean side, too. If you find that you fall foul of any of his antics, come to me and we'll form a Victims of Xingqiu alliance. There is strength in numbers.

574dd5825cd15554.voiceContent: The Conqueror of Demons himself has defended Liyue side-by-side with we exorcists for generations, day after day, night after night. I have the utmost respect for Adeptus Xiao. It's just... Why must he be so disparaging toward us? He says our repertoire is lacking and our power is trivial. I'm sorry, but I just can't accept that.

73e8b1ce395fe7b2.voiceContent: Xiangling's cooking is universally praised, but I personally don't touch any of her spicy dishes. Why? Oh, you know â€” just, uh... personal preference, that's all. I mean, come on, Mushroom Slime Stew... Does that sound appetizing to you?

0560c03543642970.voiceContent: The elders in my clan have mentioned her before. The fate of her family... *sigh* It's something we can all sympathize with. I originally thought we would be able to bring a long-lost relative back into our clan. The elders were overjoyed, too, when they heard she was still alive â€” they even prepared gifts for her, and picked an auspicious day for a grand reunion. What we hadn't counted on was that most of the time, she's extremely difficult to track down. Wait a minute, based on our relative positions in the family tree, does that mean that I... There's no way I'd have to call her Auntie Shenhe... right?

9e95141690925d7e.voiceContent: I met her once, back when I'd just become an exorcist. I'd taken a commission to perform an exorcism in someone's home, and was just leaving at the end when I ran into her. She wrote my name down in a booklet â€” I guess she just wanted to confirm I wasn't doing anything suspicious... Anyway, it was just that one time, I never saw her again after that.Now that I think about it, it's probably because the sight of me meditating motionless must be pretty boring to watch. Not exactly suspicious.

531b4cd04cb38826.voiceContent: The Wangsheng Funeral Parlor is a reputable institution that acts with integrity. But whenever I see that cheeky smile that says, It's nothing you exorcists need to worry about, it just makes my blood boil... Whoa, deep breaths, Chongyun. Stay calm.

196081db56b6bed7.voiceContent: She looks like a zombie, but as an exorcist, I feel there's... something different about her. Hmm, her name is also absent from all the praised names I've seen... Where exactly does she fit in among the deities?

0a5ff41a3ad42746.voiceContent: I avoid Xinyan's performances like the plague. That heated atmosphere... Even if you don't intend to get involved, it still... Let's just say that it gets me all hot and bothered.

f442f185a41b08ce.voiceContent: Discipline is everything. Unbridled passion can have disastrous consequences. Trust me, I would know. ...Oh, no no no, not from personal experience, of course. Haha... Uh... I'm just stating my observations from what I've seen in my travels around Liyue.

772a3f8f0b3d31f1.voiceContent: I was born with a pure yang spirit, meaning I have too much positive energy... Apparently it's so rare it only happens once every thousand generations or so. It means I repel all evil for miles around... *sigh* Actually, that's a bad thing. I must be the only exorcist in history who can't get within ten miles of an evil spirit.

f56ce5974e9d1470.voiceContent: One of the main consequences of having a pure yang spirit is excess passion, something which has gotten me into many embarrassing situations. In an effort to alleviate these symptoms, I have to abstain from eating chilis and all hot food. I also have to take a parasol with me everywhere, and I avoid listening to rousing music. I wonder, will I ever find a way to work around my condition?

aec4b35bdeec84c3.voiceContent: Waiting for evil to show up at the doorstep will get you nowhere â€” you have to go out and hunt it down. By purging Liyue of evil spirits, I bring peace of mind to people and also broaden my horizons. If an evil spirit ever bothers you, just let me know. I'll come and help you out right away.

594f81655debe6fa.voiceContent: To permanently banish the forces of evil from the world is my ultimate goal as an exorcist. If that grand day ever comes, I suppose I should be able to consider trying many new things, such as hot springs, Jueyun Chilis, and... partaking in other activities of a more passionate nature. Ugh, what am I doing... Ugh, I shouldn't be dwelling on these things, even thinking about them is too stimulating for me...

e3a329e4b4709f2a.voiceContent: I like listening to Tea Master Liu's stories. His narration really brings the hair-raising tales of the supernatural to life. Why not come with me some time?

42724159f801059f.voiceContent: After making numerous inquiries and putting in an enormous amount of effort, I finally tracked down the location of an old haunted temple. So I camped out there for four whole days, ready to exorcise the hell out of that place... and nothing happened. Not even the faintest glimpse of an evil spirit. *sigh* Sadly, this is a regular occurrence for me.

774b13524d73164d.voiceContent: Nothing makes me happier than sitting down to an authentic Inazuman meal, ingredients imported of course. After training hard all day, the ice-cold freshness of Inazuman cuisine takes the exhaustion away.

7a9b8c18d382a12f.voiceContent: Anything piping hot and laden with chilis is an absolute no-go for me. The mere thought of a Jueyun Chili gives me hot flashes.

71beef059ba2fdfa.voiceContent: Cold dishes are just to my liking! I'll save some for after my training.

0c481400cac344e0.voiceContent: I'm sorry, I know you mean well, but I really need to wait for it to cool off before I eat it.

63692c919d5ed174.voiceContent: Oh no! Did you put Jueyun Chilis in this?

8ab23f62a82cd6db.voiceContent: On the anniversary of your birth, please accept this gift of a flower, made of ice crystals. I carved it myself. If you ever encounter an evil spirit, cast this toward it â€” the spell I have cast upon it will immediately come into effect and hopefully get you out alive. Also... Happy birthday.

28a9319b4275e959.voiceContent: We often use these materials for thaumaturgy during exorcisms â€” I never knew they could be used to purify one's own spirit, too.

bbcb0392790cccf6.voiceContent: Martial arts and thaumaturgy are alike in that there are always new dimensions to explore. Thanks to your guidance, I can see myself making progress.

1175e588fa3a725f.voiceContent: Never before have I fathomed such lofty heights of martial prowess! For eye and hand, man and blade to act in unity... Truly, I have been enlightened.

b73ad780cba73894.voiceContent: With all the secrets arts that I have learned, my goal of banishing all evil from the world is finally in view. I will never forget how much you have done for me. Maybe now I even have what it takes to face the flames of my positive energy, and see if I can take the heat.

73984963e803e9c7.voiceContent: This spells the end of the exorcists...

ce111258bc9ae72e.voiceContent: I ride on wind and cloud alike.

ec33e072936f5c9e.voiceContent: I'm sorry, I know you mean well, but I really need to wait for it to cool off before I eat it.

8930173fafee9004.voiceContent: Cold dishes are just to my liking! I'll save some for after my training.

3121706e1adff42a.voiceContent: Oh no! Did you put Jueyun Chilis in this?

e8380c4bd667054f.voiceContent: I look forward to seeing your techniques!

e330d7e1932598d0.voiceContent: I won! But all this yang energy... doesn't feel so good.

3e9d5d5643e3412b.voiceContent: I really like the feel of these cards...

077565d73b3753ec.voiceContent: Hmm... I guess I'm not really cut out for this kind of game...

28ef3e63ee00e908.voiceContent: My preparation paid off in the end.

83cd7226c36179f8.voiceContent: Okay, watch what I can do.

4316000eabc728ff.voiceContent: The straight and narrow path leads to true victory.

84d6513bd90ac1e8.voiceContent: Until next time. I'll have to give my deck some more thought before we play again...

4bb7bc6196fdc969.voiceContent: Here's a taste of my skill!

2a76fe37e6c95492.voiceContent: Don't count your pigeons just yet...
